com.rath.rathbot.msg

Class AntiSpam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rath.rathbot.msg.AntiSpam

  • public class AntiSpam
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains anti-spam checks for the bot, which are unnecessary because I didn't know Discord has its own.
    Author:
    Tim Backus tbackus127@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean IGNORE_IMAGE_POSTS
      Whether or not to ignore messages containing only a single image (for dumps).
      private static int KICKS_TO_BAN
      How many kicks it takes for the bot to ban a user.
      private static int MAX_HISTORY_LENGTH
      The maximum number of messages to keep in a user's history.
      private static int[] MUTE_DURATIONS
      Mute durations, in seconds.
      private static int MUTE_KICK_THRESHOLD
      How many messages a user needs to send while muted to be kicked.
      private static int MUTES_TO_KICK
      How many mutes it takes for the bot to kick a user.
      private static int PERM_LVL_IGNORE
      Permissions level required to bypass spam filtering.
      static java.lang.String REASON_MSG_RATE_ABUSE
      The reason that will be entered in infraction entries when the message rate is abused.
      static java.lang.String REASON_REPEAT_MSG_ABUSE
      The reason that will be entered in infraction entries when repeat messages are abused.
      private static java.lang.String[] REPEAT_PREFIX_EXCEPTIONS
      If messages begin with these characters, do not count them in repeat message flagging.
      private static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<MessageTrackerEntry>> trackerEntries
      A table of all tracked users to their chat history.
      private static int TRIGGER_DUPLICATE_MSG_COUNT
      The number of sequential, duplicate messages required to trigger repeat message abuse.
      private static int[] TRIGGER_RATE_MSG_COUNTS
      How many messages trigger spam protection for the amount of time indicated by the same index of TRIGGER_RATE_TIMEOUT_SECS.
      private static int[] TRIGGER_RATE_TIMEOUT_SECS
      The amount of time that anti-spam can trigger for the counts defined in the same index of TRIGGER_RATE_MSG_COUNTS.
      private static int WARN_COOLDOWN_SEC
      Cooldown between spam warnings, in seconds.
      private static int WARNS_TO_MUTE
      How many warns it takes for the bot to mute a user.

        private static final int[] TRIGGER_RATE_TIMEOUT_SECS
        The amount of time that anti-spam can trigger for the counts defined in the same index of TRIGGER_RATE_MSG_COUNTS.

        private static final int TRIGGER_DUPLICATE_MSG_COUNT
        The number of sequential, duplicate messages required to trigger repeat message abuse.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_HISTORY_LENGTH

        private static final int MAX_HISTORY_LENGTH
        The maximum number of messages to keep in a user's history. This should be the maximum value in TRIGGER_RATE_MSG_COUNTS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • filterMessage

        public static final boolean filterMessage(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IMessage message)
        Performs message filtering for spam and muted users.
        Parameters:
        message - the IMessage the event handler received.
        Returns:
        true if the spam filtering was flagged; false if not.

      • checkSpamType

        public static final SpamTrigger checkSpamType(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IMessage msg)
        Tests if a message triggers an anti-spam mechanism.
        Parameters:
        msg - the IMessage event.
        Returns:
        true if spam; false if not.

      • checkMessageRate

        public static final boolean checkMessageRate(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IMessage msg)
        Checks if a message rate threshold has been passed.
        Parameters:
        msg - Discord IMessage object from the EventHandler.
        Returns:
        true if the anti-spam was triggered.
